title: Network+
description: The CompTIA Network+ certification qualifies the networking professional for  installation and configuration, media and topologies, management, and security.
target: - Qualified  networking professional. Candidate job roles include: network administrator, network technician. network installer, help desk technician and IT cable installer.
subjects: - network technologies, installation and configuration- media and topologies- network management- network security- virtual networking- the seven-layer OSI (Open System Interconnection) model
